name: ChronoStrike
description:
Evil has ensued over a quantum facility after the Sentinel Contingency. As a member of an elite military unit tasked with taking down rogue enemies, you have to explore the facility, fight off enemies along the way, and destroy the boss robot.

Similar to a gungame, you earn points to switch to better weapons. Explore procedurally generated environments with unique variations and layouts. 
Earn as high of a score you can. Good luck :D

Use fast paced movement to your advantage to evade enemy fire while also destroying every single enemy that interferes with your task.

How to Play:
To Move = [WASD]
To Sprint = [Left Shift]
To Grapple = [Q]
To Shoot = [Left Click]
